column4: If i install kde and remove gnome,does my programs get effected?(actually do you recommend sth like this?)
did u only install KDE and GNOME or Kubuntu-desktop and Ubuntu-Desktop?
i actually have Ubuntu Desktop and i think i use more kde apps ,so i think installing kde would reduce my cpu usage.
i started to think that KDE is better for me and i want to try by not harming something.I think it won't harm but incase,i wanted to ast someone who has done this.
